==Detailed Show Notes==

Topics covered<ref>[https://knowledgefight.com/research/2022/2/15/episode-649-february-14-2022 Episode #649: February 14, 2022]</ref>:

*Alex gets on board the "vaccine gives people AIDS" (or "VAIDS") train
*He says that more heterosexuals are being diagnosed with HIV, but that is just a misreading of [https://www.theguardian.com/commentisfree/2022/feb/09/hiv-infects-heterosexual-gay-bisexual-men-uk-testing-virus a recent Guardian article]
*The Moderna research into an mRNA HIV vaccine has been in the works for over a year now. They just launched their [https://www.healthline.com/health-news/moderna-launches-clinical-trial-of-its-mrna-based-hiv-vaccine phase 1 human trials]
*A new variant of HIV was [https://www.science.org/doi/10.1126/science.abk1688 identified in the Netherlands], but all the details Alex describes about the story are made up
*Alex misrepresents [https://transcripts.cnn.com/show/fzgps/date/2014-05-25/segment/01 George Soros's comments] about Ukraine from a 2014 interview with Fareed Zakaria
*Alex and Roger Stone misreport the contents of the [https://storage.courtlistener.com/recap/gov.uscourts.dcd.235638/gov.uscourts.dcd.235638.35.0_1.pdf Durham filing]
*[https://www.nytimes.com/2022/02/14/us/politics/durham-sussmann-trump-russia.html NYT article] about Durham filing. [https://www.washingtonpost.com/politics/2022/02/15/heres-why-trump-once-again-is-claiming-spying-by-democrats/ Washington Post article] about Durham filing
*Alex's previous guest about the Ottawa convoy, [https://pressprogress.ca/meet-the-extremists-and-social-media-influencers-at-the-centre-of-the-far-right-siege-of-ottawa/ Jeremy Mackenzie], is also [https://www.antihate.ca/holocaust_denier_travelling_canada_building_up_far_right_militia_diagolon_alex_vriend the de facto leader of a neo-fascist group] that wants to create a new country called Diagolon. He also was recently arrested on gun charges, and a piece of body armor recently seized by Canadian police at the protests in Coutts [https://globalnews.ca/news/8621125/canadian-anti-hate-network-concerned-diagolon-coutts-border-protest-diagolon/ had a Diagolon patch on it]
*Alex interviews a guy named Dr. Marble who has nothing but bad ideas
*An insurance CEO [https://thehill.com/changing-america/well-being/longevity/588738-huge-huge-numbers-death-rates-up-40-percent-over-pre did say that deaths were way up] since the pandemic began, but he did not say that these are not Covid-deaths
